author: jt.aussiegingersnap
title: No-Code NFT Generator [Revelar]
description: The process for creating generative NFT's is complex and hard for artists who want to create NFT's for games without an expensive developer.
solution: Create an easy web app for any artist to upload their art layers, choose rarity algorithms & export all final assets ready to mint as NFT's
experience: A decade as a Tech Founder & CTO + Plutus Pioneer + Fund 6 + alongside a full team of engineers. (See below)
